name: Alien Dimension
description:
Discord :- 

@HG-007#3871

@GaxTar music#4060

This game was made in about a week for Pygame Summer Jam 2022, with all the assets created within this period.

You are a Time Traveller, stuck in another dimension. The Alien Dimension !

You only have your usual laser gun and your mind, escape from there.

The PG Boss awaits you!

_______CONTROLS________________

# Use AWD keys or Arrow Keys to move.

# Press 'F' to toggle Fullscreen while playing.

# Use your Mouse to aim the Laser Gun.

# Escape to exit in Main Menu.

# Escape to go to Main Menu while playing.

_______CREDITS_________________

# Art and Programming by Quantum_HG.
